form.immediate-update-title: Automatically apply updates on field changes.

dialog.search-document: Choose a document type you wish to search:
dialog.document-not-found: `No documents found for the selected type. ({document})`

clipboard.copy: Mass Edit: Copied {document} data to clipboard

macro.dependency-warning: This macro requires {module} module to be active.
macro.target-all-title: Macro will target ALL {document}s at run-time within the chosen 'Scope'.
macro.target-ids-title: IDs of currently selected documents will be stored in the macro.
macro.target-search-title: Macro will search for {document}s matching specific fields at run-time.
macro.target-tagger-title: Macro will target Tagger module's tags at run-time.

presetApply.name: Open Presets
presetApply.hint: Opens Preset dialog for the hovered/selected placeables to immediately apply them.

selectKey.name: Open Placeable Search and Select
selectKey.hint: When pressed will open a Configuration window where you will be able to choose fields using which the module will search and select placeables on the current scene.

editKey.name: Open Multi-Placeable Edit
editKey.hint: When pressed will open a Configuration window to simultaneously update all selected placeables.

genericForm.name: Open Generic Multi-Object Edit
genericForm.hint: When pressed will open a Configuration window to simultaneously update all selected objects.

autoSnap.name: Auto-snap coordinates to Grid
autoSnap.hint: When using "Select Range" in the coordinate randomizer menu, the range values will automatically be snapped to the grid.

panToSearch.name: Pan to Search Target
panToSearch.hint: Automatically centers the screen on the first found placeable.

tmfxFieldsEnable.name: Insert TMFX Fields
tmfxFieldsEnable.hint: DungeonDraft tint color and Preset filter fields will be added to Mass Edit forms. Selecting these fields will cause TokenMagicFX filters to be applied.

historyMaxLength.name: History Max Length
historyMaxLength.hint: Number of updates to be recorded in history.

enableHistory.name: Update History
enableHistory.hint: (REQUIRES GAME RELOAD) When enabled updates made to placeables will be stored and accessible via Mass Edit forms.

enableFlagsTab.name: Flags Tab
enableFlagsTab.hint: When enabled 'Flags' tab will be added to Mass Edit forms to allow updating and removing of document flags.

rangeToTextbox.name: Allow manual input for range sliders
rangeToTextbox.hint: Converts slider value labels to text boxes.

singleDocDefaultConfig.name: Single placeable: Default Config
singleDocDefaultConfig.hint: When a single placeable is selected or hovered over, open the default configuration window instead of the modified Mass Edit config.

cssEdit.name: Configure CSS
cssEdit.hint: Change the look of the modified configuration window.

randomizer.listOfImages: List of images to be used during randomization
randomizer.listOfStrings: List of strings to be used during randomization

presets.warn-no-fields: No fields selected, unable to update.
presets.export-directory-message: This operation will make the destination into a Mass Edit preset compendium. Make sure it does not contain Journals that are not presets to avoid unexpected problems.
presets.working-directory-message: Change the compendium the module will store and edit presets within. Make sure it does not contains Journals that are not presets to avoid unexpected problems.
